references.paper_title: R1-v: Reinforcing super generalization ability in vision-language models with less than $3
references.reason: This paper introduces R1-V, which enhances the generalization capabilities of vision-language models, and this work uses it for emotion recognition.

references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in llms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper likely details the DeepSeek R1 model, which is the inspiration for the RLVR used in this work.

references.paper_title: DFEW: A large-scale database for recognizing dynamic facial expressions in the wild
references.reason: This paper introduces the DFEW dataset, one of the main datasets used for training and evaluating the proposed model.

references.paper_title: MAFW: A Large-scale, Multi-modal, Compound Affective Database for Dynamic Facial Expression Recognition in the Wild
references.reason: This paper introduces the MAFW dataset, another of the main datasets used for training and evaluating the proposed model.

references.paper_title: Humanomni: A large vision-speech language model for human-centric video understanding
references.reason: This paper likely details the HumanOmni model, which is the base model used as the foundation for the proposed R1-Omni model.
